医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究报告美国孕产妇死亡率惊人上升西北医学的一项新研究报告称，美国孕产妇死亡率正在以惊人的速度上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-alarming-increase-in-US-maternal-mortality-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-alarming-increase-in-US-maternal-mortality-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d455c23d-d5ce-40f5-bc67-9a83d447c372 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 07:26:39 -0400 Study reports alarming increase in U.S. maternal mortality rates
昆士兰大学研究旨在了解成年女性多动症的经历我们鼓励成年后被诊断患有注意力缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 的女性参加昆士兰大学的一项研究，了解该诊断的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/UQ-study-aims-to-understand-experiences-of-ADHD-in-adult-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/UQ-study-aims-to-understand-experiences-of-ADHD-in-adult-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7950e7e4-179a-4822-9fe8-efcfae4e19de Wed, 20 Mar 2024 07:19:29 -0400 UQ study aims to understand experiences of ADHD in adult women

观察：许多美国人不知道艾滋病毒预防药物KFF 健康新闻公共卫生特约编辑 Céline Gounder 在“哥伦比亚广播公司早间节目”上解释了为什么许多高危美国人不知道或无法获得预防通过性接触感染艾滋病毒的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Watch-Many-Americans-are-unaware-of-HIV-prevention-medication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Watch-Many-Americans-are-unaware-of-HIV-prevention-medication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61a9d549-c5c4-48a8-b7f3-86408a20bfda Wed, 20 Mar 2024 07:01:52 -0400 Watch: Many Americans are unaware of HIV prevention medication
对于孩子来说，针痛是一个大问题。一位加州医生有一个计划。几乎所有新父母都会经历过这样的经历：听到孩子在医生办公室尖叫的痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Needle-pain-is-a-big-problem-for-kids-One-California-doctor-has-a-plan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Needle-pain-is-a-big-problem-for-kids-One-California-doctor-has-a-plan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162f488b-b9b6-478b-8f33-0556f636d246 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 06:59:23 -0400 Needle pain is a big problem for kids. One California doctor has a plan.
尽管入学率较低，但佐治亚州的医疗补助工作要求仍使纳税人损失数百万美元佐治亚州州长布赖恩·肯普 (Brian Kemp) 提出的奥巴马医改医疗补助扩张计划的保守替代方案迄今为止已使纳税人损失了至少 2600 万美元，其中 90% 以上用于行政和咨询费用，而不是低收入人群的医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Georgiae28099s-Medicaid-work-requirements-costing-taxpayers-millions-despite-low-enrollment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Georgiae28099s-Medicaid-work-requirements-costing-taxpayers-millions-despite-low-enrollment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=939ef53f-6695-44a9-97c3-9c0b39cb5f0a Wed, 20 Mar 2024 06:57:14 -0400 Georgia’s Medicaid work requirements costing taxpayers millions despite low enrollment

体力活动与已婚女性患抑郁症的风险直接相关，但与已婚男性无关已婚人士的体育锻炼与抑郁风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Physical-activity-is-directly-lated-to-the-risk-of-depression-in-married-women-but-not-in-married-男士.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Physical-activity-is-directly-lated-to-the-risk-of-depression-in-married-women-but-not-in-married- men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1a1ca71-2927-418d-845a-826d8df2ecf1 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 05:45:00 -0400 Physical activity is directly related to the risk of depression in married women, but not in married men
放射学领域的人工智能辅助表现出好坏参半的结果医疗人工智能工具最受吹捧的承诺之一是它们能够帮助人类临床医生更精确地解读 X 射线和 CT 扫描等图像，从而做出更准确的诊断，从而增强人类临床医生的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/AI-assistance-in-radiology-shows-mixed-results-for-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/AI-assistance-in-radiology-shows-mixed-results-for-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02bfaedf-e51e-4d2f-be4a-94b48c2e74c2 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 23:37:00 -0400 AI assistance in radiology shows mixed results for performance
